articles.author: Jessica Chasmar
articles.title: New poll on President Biden's mental, physical health offers warning sign for 2024 - Fox News
articles.description: The vast majority of Americans believe President Biden doesn’t have the physical or mental capacity to serve as president, according to a new poll.
articles.content: President Biden is facing significant headwinds at the start of his re-election campaign, with the vast majority of Americans saying he doesnt have the physical or mental capacity to serve another te… [+2618 chars]
